docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Set the digital MSO2XX channels on (1) or off (0).

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: all_channels
parameters.description: Turn all channels on? The display parameters aren't used if True.

parameters.name: D0_display
parameters.description: Turn the channel on (1) or off (0).

parameters.name: D1_display
parameters.description: Turn the channel on (1) or off (0).

parameters.description: Turn the channel on (1) or off (0).
